text_block_list.text:
――The start of Autumn. The first thing we needed to do was 
have a meeting to decide on Rhein Kraft's next few races.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, I guess my next main objective 
is the 『Shuuka Sho』. And if I win there――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Then I'll have achieved the "Unorthodox Triple Crown"!
Yeah, that's right.
Yeah, that's right.

That main goal would remain unchanged. The question was…… 
whether we should enter a race before mid-October or not.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
If you want to save your stamina, then just save it 
for the "Real thing". If you want to get used to 
the race distance, then we should do one beforehand.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Trainer, what do you think?
I think……it would be better to run a 2000m race beforehand.
I think……it would be better to run a 2000m race beforehand.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
2000m…… 
The same distance as the 『Shuuka Sho』
Yeah, I have two reasons.
Yeah, I have two reasons.

First. Rhein Kraft is the fastest when it comes to 1600m races, 
but 2000m is a different story. She needs to get used to the pace.

First. Rhein Kraft is the fastest when it comes to 1600m races, 
but 2000m is a different story. She needs to get used to the pace.
And the second――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: That Uma Musume will be participating in the preliminaries.

I nod. Since Cesario isn't here now, 
most likely, her number one rival is……

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: Haaaaa……!

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, Shakur-san, how was that?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
――It's disappeared, the annoying noise from the spring. 
If you can hit these numbers then……

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: Is there a chance? In this preliminary battle.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
Aah? You're aiming for the 『Shuuka Sho』 aren't you? 
My calculations didn't include the prelimiaries 
from the start. Just go ahead and win.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
But……exactly what adjustments have you made? 
Growth during the summer doesn't explain these numbers……

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
A small one――I just cleared my mind a little. 
And took another look at the name I was given.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
Mother, I apologize about the 『Oaks』. 
At the 『Shuuka Sho』 for sure, for mother's sake.

text_block_list.name: Messiah's Mother
text_block_list.text:
Messiah, you don't need to think about it so much. 
For the last crown……

text_block_list.name: Messiah's Mother
text_block_list.text:
……I want you to run for your own sake. 
Not for mine.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: Mother, but……

text_block_list.name: Messiah's Mother
text_block_list.text:
Messiah. The wish behind your name is not "Revenge". 
Clearing my regrets is not the meaning of your existence.

text_block_list.name: Messiah's Mother
text_block_list.text:
Messiah……the meaning behind your name is "Salvation". 
To improve yourself, and escape the shackles of 
your blood on your own. Don't forget that.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
To save……save myself…… 
Ah……!?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Air Messiah-san…… Please don't be so harsh on yourself. 
You…… "both of you" were strong. That strength――

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Opened my eyes. I was able to break away from my old 
self. Becoming a better version of myself led to victory.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
I…… see…… This spring, I lost sight of that and 
was defeated. My opponent was "Aiming to become 
a better version of herself". In that case……

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
I need to change my mindset. From now on, for myself, who 
holds mother in such high esteem……I'll become my own Messiah.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
Cesario-san, at this moment, 
now I understand why I couldn't measure up to you.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
I won't waver anymore. 
Not for someone else's sake――but for my own glory!
And then――the day of the preliminaries.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, I'll do it! Just like I promised Cesario, 
I'll obtain the Unorthodox Triple Crown! For the sake of that――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Today, I can't lose, I can't lose, I can't lose! 
For Cesario too, I'll need to carry the team!

I was concerned that she sounded a little anxious. But her title 
wasn't just for show. I believed in Rhein Kraft as I saw her off.

text_block_list.name: Kraft&Messiah
text_block_list.text:
Yaaaaaaaaaa!! 
Haaaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
(I need to do it, I need to! 
For Cesario!)

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
(I can achieve it, I'll show them I can! 
I will aim for the future!)

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
Rhein Kraft is out in front, Air Messiah chases! 
Rhein Kraft is out in front, Air Messiah chases!

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: The first step……to salvation!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Kuuuu!!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Air Messiah passes, she passes!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Today it's Air Messiah!

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
Haa, haa…… Kraft-san, first, 
this is payback for the 『Oka Sho』. Next time too――for sure!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Messiah-san……is really strong, isn't she……? 
For the real thing, I'll need to create more separation!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
……She got us good. But, this is still just the preliminaries. 
Today, just getting a feel for 2000m is good enough.

Yeah. Mile and 2000m races have different 
paces and things to keep in mind.

Yeah. Mile and 2000m races have different 
paces and things to keep in mind.

Defeat was inevitable. And this race made it clear. Air Messiah, 
who placed 2nd at the 『Oaks』, was the biggest threat.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I won't let you……you won't catch me! 
Next time……next time for sure……!
